author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HONE CONTINUING TO MOVE NORTH-NORTHWEST TOWARD THE WESTERN  END OF THE PAPAHANAUMOKUAKEA MARINE NATIONAL MONUMENT....
summary:
...HONE CONTINUING TO MOVE NORTH-NORTHWEST TOWARD THE WESTERN  END OF THE PAPAHANAUMOKUAKEA MARINE NATIONAL MONUMENT....
 As of 2:00 PM HST Sat Aug 31
 the center of Hone was located near 23.3, -176.5
 with movement NNW at 10 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Hone (CP1/CP012024)
